DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if the use of a tourniquet during insertion of a cemented primary total knee arthroplasty will influence clinical and radiological (measured with RSA X-ray technique) outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Stereoradiological Comparison of the Results After Primary Cemented Total Knee Arthroplasty Inserted With or Without the Use of a Tourniquet
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis og osteoarthritis of the knee patients must be 18 years or older patients must understand and speak danish must be able to give signed consent severe medical illness documented osteoporosis rheumatoid arthritis prior surgery in the knee neuropathy
